dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2757110N] cease and desist
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, January 28, 2007 1:20 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2757110N] cease and desist

From: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2757110N] cease and desist
Reference: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2757110N]

For your review. 

--
Regards,
Abuse Department
The Planet
abuse@theplanet.com
http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html


==== Original Message ====

Dear ThePlanet.com 
 
I have learned that your service is hosting infringing  files on its
network (see above-reference) 
 
1.) my name found in  the source code, meta keywords,  of your customer

website,  madamfable.com.   
 
"cgonsa, cathy, Gonsalves".   
 
Found on numerous pages including, madamfable.som 
  
2.) Prior cease and desist for plagiarism verified by copyscape on
1/13/07   
sent to your customer. 
_http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=58932&u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.madamfable
.com%2
Fstore%2Fcart.php%3Fact%3Dreg%26redir%3DL3N0b3JlL2luZGV4LnBocA%3D%3D&t=1
168708
789&s=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.cgonsa.com%2Fcontent%2Fview%2F23%2F108%2F&w=63&c_
(http://www.copyscape.com/view.php?o=58932&u=http://www.madamfable.com/s
tore/cart.p
hp?act=reg&redir=L3N0b3JlL2luZGV4LnBocA==&t=1168708789&s=http://www.cgon
sa.com
/content/view/23/108/&w=63&c) = 
  
I am asking for your immediate assistance in stopping this  unauthorized
activity.  In addition, please inform the site operator of the
illegality of his or her conduct. 
 
Please see attached evidence including copyscape screenshot from
1/13/07,   
screenshot madamfable.com source code 1/28/07, cease and desist of
1/13/07 
  
Thank you,
Cathy Gonsalves
cgonsa.com
